EmailTemplate.name: Course Assignment is Ready for Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: NCT Course assignment for {!Course_Assignment__c.PSA_Area__c}/{!Course_Assignment__c.Course__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Course_Assignment__c.OwnerFirstName},
NCT has sent you this email so that you securely sign your assignment for this course online.
Please log in to the Practitioner community to review and sign this assignment.
The following comments (if any) were included in the approval request: '{!ApprovalRequest.Comments}'
Kind Regards,
{!Course_Assignment__c.LastModifiedBy} Capacity PSA - {!Course_Assignment__c.PSA_Area__c}
